comments.body: The line above that says "registeredGroupVersions[0]" can't possibly be right, can it?
why? registeredGroupVersions is an array of all the groupVersions that has a "experimental/" prefix.
But how do you know the [0]th one is the one you want?

because we ask people to specify the versions in the order of the most preferred first, 

https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/pkg/api/registered/registered.go#L42

Oh-- this is from a list. I see. Sorry!

On Mon, Sep 21, 2015 at 3:29 PM, Chao Xu notifications@github.com wrote:

> In pkg/apis/experimental/install/install.go
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/14156#discussion_r40034863
> :
> 
> > @@ -51,14 +51,16 @@ func init() {
> >         GroupVersion: groupVersion,
> 
> because we ask people to specify the versions in the order of the most
> preferred first,
> 
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/master/pkg/api/registered/registered.go#L42
> 
> â€”
> Reply to this email directly or view it on GitHub
> https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/pull/14156/files#r40034863.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +49,53 @@	groupVersion := registeredGroupVersions[0]
	*groupMeta = latest.GroupMeta{
		GroupVersion: groupVersion,
		Group:        apiutil.GetGroup(groupVersion),
		Version:      apiutil.GetVersion(groupVersion),
